SQLSelect.Command:
select result.EMKEY, result.IDA_ENTITY, result.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN, result.IDEM, result.IDCE, result.IDPR, result.IDPR_POSREQUEST, result.NIVEAU, result.MAINPROCESS, result.REQUESTMODE, result.MAINSTATUS, result.MAINEXTENDVALUE, result.DTSTPROCESS_L, result.PROCESS_L, result.IDSTPROCESS_L, result.STATUSRETURN, result.STATUSRETURNDISPLAY, result.IDDATAPROCESS_L, result.IDA, result.HOSTNAME, result.APPNAME, result.APPVERSION, result.REQUESTTYPE as REQUESTTYPE_VALUE, result.EXTVALUE as REQUESTTYPE_EXTVALUE, result.EXTVALUE || '-' || result.STATUSRETURN || '-' || to_char(result.NIVEAU) as REQUESTTYPE_DISPLAY, result.IDPROCESS_L, result.IDAINS, result.DTINS, result.DTUPD, result.REQUESTDETAIL, result.EXTLLINK, result.ROWATTRIBUT, result.ROWVERSION, result.IDI, result.IDASSET, result.IDA_DEALER, result.IDB_DEALER, result.IDA_CLEARER, result.IDB_CLEARER, result.IDT, result.ENTITY, result.CSSCUSTODIAN, result.IDM, result.MARKET, result.DTMARKET, result.QTY, /*--DEALER--*/ dealer.IDENTIFIER as DEALER_IDENTIFIER,dealer.DISPLAYNAME as DEALER_DISPLAYNAME, bdealer.IDENTIFIER as DEALER_BOOKIDENTIFIER, /*--CLEARER--*/ clearer.IDENTIFIER as CLEARER_IDENTIFIER, clearer.DISPLAYNAME as CLEARER_DISPLAYNAME, bclearer.IDENTIFIER as CLEARER_BOOKIDENTIFIER, /*--ASSET--*/ asset.ASSETCATEGORY as CATEGORY, asset.IDENTIFIER as ASSET_IDENTIFIER, asset.CHARACTERISTICS, result.MAINIDPRORDER, result.IDPRORDER, result.ASSETCATEGORY, result.GPRODUCT from ( select TO_CHAR(emlog.IDEM) as EMKEY, pr.IDA_ENTITY, emlog.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN, pr.IDEM, pr.IDCE, pr.IDPR, pr.IDPR_POSREQUEST, prcte.NIVEAU, prcte.MAINPROCESS, pr.REQUESTMODE, prcte.MAINSTATUS, pl.DTSTPROCESS as DTSTPROCESS_L, pl.PROCESS as PROCESS_L, nvl(pl.IDSTPROCESS,'PENDING') as IDSTPROCESS_L, pr.STATUS as STATUSRETURN, case pr.STATUS when 'NA' then 'NOTHING' else pr.STATUS end as STATUSRETURNDISPLAY, pl.IDDATA as IDDATAPROCESS_L, pl.IDA, pl.HOSTNAME, pl.APPNAME, pl.APPVERSION, pr.REQUESTTYPE, pr.IDPROCESS_L, pr.IDAINS, pr.DTINS as DTINS, nvl(pr.DTUPD,pr.DTINS) as DTUPD, pr.DTBUSINESS as DTMARKET, pr.QTY, pr.REQUESTDETAIL, pr.EXTLLINK, pr.ROWATTRIBUT, pr.ROWVERSION, case when pr.IDCE is null then en.EXTVALUE else ca.IDENTIFIER || ' - ' || ca.REFNOTICE end as EXTVALUE, enMain.EXTVALUE as MAINEXTENDVALUE, a_csscust.IDENTIFIER as CSSCUSTODIAN, a_ety.IDENTIFIER as Entity, m.IDM, nvl(m.SHORT_ACRONYM,'-') as Market, nvl(tr.IDI,pr.IDI) as IDI, nvl(tr.IDASSET, pr.IDASSET) as IDASSET, nvl(tr.IDA_DEALER,pr.IDA_DEALER) as IDA_DEALER, nvl(tr.IDB_DEALER,pr.IDB_DEALER) as IDB_DEALER, nvl(tr.IDA_CLEARER,pr.IDA_CLEARER) as IDA_CLEARER, nvl(tr.IDB_CLEARER,pr.IDB_CLEARER) as IDB_CLEARER, tr.IDT, prcte.MAINIDPRORDER, prcte.IDPRORDER, ns.ASSETCATEGORY, pr.GPRODUCT from dbo.POSREQUEST pr
inner join ( select pr.IDPR, CONNECT_BY_ROOT(pr.IDPR) as MAINIDPRORDER, CONNECT_BY_ROOT(pr.REQUESTTYPE) as MAINPROCESS, CONNECT_BY_ROOT(pr.STATUS) as MAINSTATUS, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(TO_CHAR(pr.IDPR),20,'0'),'_') as IDPRORDER, nvl(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS), pr.IDA_ENTITY, LEVEL-1 as NIVEAU from dbo.POSREQUEST pr inner join dbo.VW_ENTITYMARKET_LOG emlog on (emlog.IDA_ENTITY = pr.IDA_ENTITY) and (emlog.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN = isnull(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS)) and (nvl(emlog.IDEM,0) = nvl(pr.IDEM,0)) start with /* SQL: WITHWHERE */ (pr.IDPR_POSREQUEST is null) and pr.IDPR = pr.IDPR /* SQL: ENDWITHWHERE */ and (pr.DTBUSINESS = @DATE1) and (pr.IDA_ENTITY = case when -1=@ENTITY then pr.IDA_ENTITY else @ENTITY end ) and (nvl(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS) = case when -1=@CSSCUSTODIAN then nvl(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS) when -2=@CSSCUSTODIAN then pr.IDA_CSS when -3=@CSSCUSTODIAN then pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN else @CSSCUSTODIAN end)
connect by nocycle prior pr.IDPR = pr.IDPR_POSREQUEST and LEVEL-1 <= case when 2 = @NIVEAU then 6 else @NIVEAU+1 end ) prcte on (prcte.IDPR = pr.IDPR)
inner join dbo.VW_ENTITYMARKET_LOG emlog on (emlog.IDA_ENTITY = pr.IDA_ENTITY) and (emlog.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN = isnull(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS)) and (nvl(emlog.IDEM,0) = nvl(pr.IDEM,0))
inner join dbo.ACTOR a_csscust on (a_csscust.IDA = emlog.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN) inner join dbo.ACTOR a_ety on (a_ety.IDA = emlog.IDA_ENTITY) inner join dbo.ENUM en on (en.CODE = 'PosRequestTypeEnum') and (en.VALUE = pr.REQUESTTYPE) inner join dbo.ENUM enMain on (enMain.CODE = 'PosRequestTypeEnum') and (enMain.VALUE = prcte.MAINPROCESS)
left join dbo.PROCESS_L pl on pl.IDPROCESS_L = pr.IDPROCESS_L left join dbo.VW_INSTR_PRODUCT ns on (ns.IDI = pr.IDI) left join dbo.TRADE tr on (tr.IDT = pr.IDT) left join dbo.ENTITYMARKET em on (em.IDEM = pr.IDEM) left join dbo.VW_MARKET_IDENTIFIER m on (m.IDM = em.IDM) left join dbo.CORPOEVENT ce on (ce.IDCE = pr.IDCE) left join dbo.CORPOACTION ca on (ca.IDCA = ce.IDCA) ) result left outer join dbo.ACTOR dealer on dealer.IDA = result.IDA_DEALER left outer join dbo.BOOK bdealer on bdealer.IDB = result.IDB_DEALER left outer join dbo.ACTOR clearer on clearer.IDA = result.IDA_CLEARER left outer join dbo.BOOK bclearer on bclearer.IDB = result.IDB_CLEARER left outer join dbo.VW_ASSET_CONSULT asset on (asset.IDASSET = result.IDASSET) and (asset.ASSETCATEGORY = result.ASSETCATEGORY)

/* SQL: WITH */ with POSREQUEST_CTE (EMKEY, IDA_ENTITY, IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN, IDEM, IDCE, IDPR_POSREQUEST, IDPR, DTBUSINESS, NIVEAU, MAINPROCESS,REQUESTMODE,MAINSTATUS, MAINIDPRORDER, IDPRORDER) as ( select convert(varchar,emlog.IDEM) as EMKEY, pr.IDA_ENTITY, isnull(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS) as IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN, pr.IDEM, pr.IDCE, isnull(pr.IDPR_POSREQUEST,pr.IDPR) as IDPR_POSREQUEST, pr.IDPR, pr.DTBUSINESS, 0 as NIVEAU, pr.REQUESTTYPE as MAINPROCESS ,pr.REQUESTMODE, case pr.STATUS when 'NA' then 'NOTHING' else pr.STATUS end as MAINSTATUS, pr.IDPR as MAINIDPRORDER, convert(varchar,pr.IDPR) + cast('' as varchar(max)) from dbo.POSREQUEST pr inner join dbo.VW_ENTITYMARKET_LOG emlog on (emlog.IDA_ENTITY = pr.IDA_ENTITY) and (emlog.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN = isnull(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN, pr.IDA_CSS)) and (isnull(emlog.IDEM,0) = isnull(pr.IDEM,0)) where /* SQL: WITHWHERE */ pr.IDPR_POSREQUEST is null and pr.IDPR = pr.IDPR /* SQL: ENDWITHWHERE */ and (pr.DTBUSINESS = @DATE1) and (pr.IDA_ENTITY = case when -1=@ENTITY then pr.IDA_ENTITY else @ENTITY end ) and isnull(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS) = case when -1=@CSSCUSTODIAN then isnull(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS) when -2=@CSSCUSTODIAN then pr.IDA_CSS when -3=@CSSCUSTODIAN then pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN else @CSSCUSTODIAN end
union all
select prcte.EMKEY, pr.IDA_ENTITY, isnull(pr.IDA_CUSTODIAN,pr.IDA_CSS), pr.IDEM, pr.IDCE, pr.IDPR_POSREQUEST, pr.IDPR, pr.DTBUSINESS, NIVEAU + 1, MAINPROCESS,pr.REQUESTMODE,MAINSTATUS, MAINIDPRORDER, prcte.IDPRORDER + '_' + REPLICATE('0', 20 - DATALENGTH(convert(varchar,pr.IDPR))) + convert(varchar,pr.IDPR) from dbo.POSREQUEST pr inner join POSREQUEST_CTE prcte on (pr.IDPR_POSREQUEST = prcte.IDPR) where NIVEAU <= case when 2 = @NIVEAU then 5 else @NIVEAU end ) /* SQL: ENDWITH */
select result.EMKEY, result.IDA_ENTITY, result.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN, result.IDEM, result.IDCE, result.IDPR, result.IDPR_POSREQUEST, result.NIVEAU, result.MAINPROCESS, result.REQUESTMODE, result.MAINSTATUS, result.MAINEXTENDVALUE, result.DTSTPROCESS_L, result.PROCESS_L, result.IDSTPROCESS_L, result.STATUSRETURN, result.STATUSRETURNDISPLAY, result.IDDATAPROCESS_L, result.IDA, result.HOSTNAME, result.APPNAME, result.APPVERSION, result.REQUESTTYPE as REQUESTTYPE_VALUE, result.EXTVALUE as REQUESTTYPE_EXTVALUE, result.EXTVALUE || '-' || result.STATUSRETURN || '-' || convert(varchar,result.NIVEAU) as REQUESTTYPE_DISPLAY, result.IDPROCESS_L, result.IDAINS, result.DTINS, result.DTUPD, result.REQUESTDETAIL, result.EXTLLINK, result.ROWATTRIBUT, result.ROWVERSION, result.IDI, result.IDASSET, result.IDA_DEALER, result.IDB_DEALER, result.IDA_CLEARER, result.IDB_CLEARER, result.IDT, result.ENTITY, result.CSSCUSTODIAN, result.IDM, result.MARKET, result.DTMARKET, result.QTY, /*--DEALER--*/ dealer.IDENTIFIER as DEALER_IDENTIFIER,dealer.DISPLAYNAME as DEALER_DISPLAYNAME, bdealer.IDENTIFIER as DEALER_BOOKIDENTIFIER, /*--CLEARER--*/ clearer.IDENTIFIER as CLEARER_IDENTIFIER, clearer.DISPLAYNAME as CLEARER_DISPLAYNAME, bclearer.IDENTIFIER as CLEARER_BOOKIDENTIFIER, /*--ASSET--*/ asset.ASSETCATEGORY as CATEGORY, asset.IDENTIFIER as ASSET_IDENTIFIER, asset.CHARACTERISTICS, result.MAINIDPRORDER, result.IDPRORDER, result.ASSETCATEGORY, result.GPRODUCT from ( select prcte.EMKEY, prcte.IDA_ENTITY, prcte.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN, prcte.IDEM, prcte.IDCE, prcte.IDPR, prcte.IDPR_POSREQUEST, prcte.NIVEAU, prcte.MAINPROCESS, prcte.REQUESTMODE, prcte.MAINSTATUS, pl.DTSTPROCESS as DTSTPROCESS_L, pl.PROCESS as PROCESS_L, isnull(pl.IDSTPROCESS,'PENDING') as IDSTPROCESS_L, pr.STATUS as STATUSRETURN, case pr.STATUS when 'NA' then 'NOTHING' else pr.STATUS end as STATUSRETURNDISPLAY, pl.IDDATA as IDDATAPROCESS_L, pl.IDA, pl.HOSTNAME, pl.APPNAME, pl.APPVERSION, pr.REQUESTTYPE, pr.IDPROCESS_L, pr.IDAINS, pr.DTINS as DTINS, isnull(pr.DTUPD,pr.DTINS) as DTUPD, pr.DTBUSINESS as DTMARKET, pr.QTY as QTY, pr.REQUESTDETAIL, pr.EXTLLINK, pr.ROWATTRIBUT, pr.ROWVERSION, case when prcte.IDCE is null then en.EXTVALUE else ca.IDENTIFIER || ' - ' || ca.REFNOTICE end as EXTVALUE, enMain.EXTVALUE as MAINEXTENDVALUE, a_csscust.IDENTIFIER as CSSCUSTODIAN, a_ety.IDENTIFIER as Entity, m.IDM, m.SHORT_ACRONYM as MARKET, isnull(tr.IDI, pr.IDI) as IDI, isnull(tr.IDASSET, pr.IDASSET) as IDASSET, isnull(tr.IDA_DEALER, pr.IDA_DEALER) as IDA_DEALER, isnull(tr.IDB_DEALER, pr.IDB_DEALER) as IDB_DEALER, isnull(tr.IDA_CLEARER, pr.IDA_CLEARER) as IDA_CLEARER, isnull(tr.IDB_CLEARER, pr.IDB_CLEARER) as IDB_CLEARER, tr.IDT, prcte.MAINIDPRORDER, prcte.IDPRORDER, ns.ASSETCATEGORY, pr.GPRODUCT from POSREQUEST_CTE prcte inner join dbo.POSREQUEST pr on (pr.IDPR = prcte.IDPR) inner join dbo.ACTOR a_csscust on (a_csscust.IDA = prcte.IDA_CSSCUSTODIAN) inner join dbo.ACTOR a_ety on (a_ety.IDA = prcte.IDA_ENTITY) inner join dbo.ENUM en on (en.CODE = 'PosRequestTypeEnum') and (en.VALUE = pr.REQUESTTYPE) inner join dbo.ENUM enMain on (enMain.CODE = 'PosRequestTypeEnum') and (enMain.VALUE = prcte.MAINPROCESS) left join dbo.VW_INSTR_PRODUCT ns on (ns.IDI = pr.IDI) left join dbo.PROCESS_L pl on pl.IDPROCESS_L = pr.IDPROCESS_L left join dbo.TRADE tr on (tr.IDT = pr.IDT) left join dbo.ENTITYMARKET em on (em.IDEM = pr.IDEM) left join dbo.VW_MARKET_IDENTIFIER m on (m.IDM = em.IDM) left join dbo.CORPOEVENT ce on (ce.IDCE = prcte.IDCE) left join dbo.CORPOACTION ca on (ca.IDCA = ce.IDCA) ) result left outer join dbo.ACTOR dealer on dealer.IDA = result.IDA_DEALER left outer join dbo.BOOK bdealer on bdealer.IDB = result.IDB_DEALER left outer join dbo.ACTOR clearer on clearer.IDA = result.IDA_CLEARER left outer join dbo.BOOK bclearer on bclearer.IDB = result.IDB_CLEARER left outer join dbo.VW_ASSET_CONSULT asset on (asset.IDASSET = result.IDASSET) and (asset.ASSETCATEGORY = result.ASSETCATEGORY)
